sourceMeaningMnemonic: The <radical>leader</radical> of your <radical>clan</radical> wants to live close to the <radical>ground</radical> so he demands you get <kanji>low</kanji>. Low, low, with your belly to the ground. That way you're always below him, since he's the leader.
meaningInfo: Picture yourself, face smooshed into the ground, and you can hear the leader shouting above you, "GET LOW!"
readingMnemonic: <kanji>Low</kanji> people like you can only eat low food like potatoes. But that's boring, so you low people learned to make <reading>ta</reading>ter (<ja>てい</ja>) tots. You roll them to each other and eat them without lifting your heads.
readingInfo: Get low to the ground right now and ask your mom or dad to roll some tater tots towards your face. Eat them up, mm mm.
